website_summaries.verdict: While the convenient features and easy setup will impress you, its quality concerns and awkward disassembly will most likely be frustrating.
pros: A spacious 4-person model that's easy to set up
Has ample interior compartments and a hook for organizing items
cons: Pricey, and some design flaws – not completely waterproof, awkward exterior window openings, and design that's hard to fold and put back into its bag after use

customer_reviews.title: Loved the window size and both side accessibility
customer_reviews.text: Held up very well after 1 coat of rain off spray and no rain fly for 4 nights camping and 2 rainstorms that lasted over 3 hours each. Fit a single person cot and all my gear. Loved the window size and both side accessibility. Could have fit 2 smaller cots or a double size air mattress comfortably. Cons: 1. Bag to pack up has only one zipper toggle (if it breaks there isn't a second to rely on) and bag itself is very thin- ripped as I was packing the car and had to use duct tape to use for the first run. 2. Does not come with a rainfly/staked tarp for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great idea poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Great idea poor execution. The zippers on the entrances are garbage and after just two camping trips the floor has a hole in it and that's with using the floor liner. If I could return it I would and if you are looking for a durable tent look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! Fits a queen size mattress very well and felt stable throughout the evening. We put a tarp on the inside to cup the floor in case of rain and also put a smaller tarp on the bottom outside to direct any rainwater away as well as soften the ground a bit.
customer_reviews.author: chm4184

customer_reviews.title: Need better mesh screen on all windows and doors
customer_reviews.text: I just went camping for 4 days and 3 nights and here's what I think: Pros: 1) Extremely easy to set up tent. It takes me less than 10 seconds to set up. 2) Plenty of air vents. 3) Comes with strings & stakes. Cons: 1) comes with an extra mesh screen that is useless inside the tent and is not sealed and also takes up precious space. 2) either the tent is not sealed or the holes in the screen mesh is too big because multiple types of ants kept coming inside the tent, not only that, I caught a baby centapede in my tent!
customer_reviews.author: Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Tent Set Up in 5 Seconds..
customer_reviews.text: This tent is super quick and easy to set up, therefore you can spend more time enjoying the great outdoors! The seller is helpful and friendly and fast to respond to any questions or concerns, that you may have. The tent is made of quality material and the shipping was super fast. The packaging was also excellent. I highly recommend this product, you will enjoy camping, as your tent is set up within 5 seconds!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good, it's a great size for two people
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks good, it's a great size for two people...no way you are putting 4 average sized adults in this tent comfortably. It was easy to set up, but took a moment to get back in the bag. I suggest learning to fold it back up BEFORE you take it out camping. 8/10 would buy again, hopefully it will stand up to moderate use over time.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lose thread and poor stitching required mending
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was incomplete. A few fasteners fell off because the loops that fasten them weren't sewn. Lots of lose thread and poor stitching required mending. Not something I'd expect to have to do for a new tent. On the plus, easy setup and tear down.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: A nice little tent
customer_reviews.text: A nice little tent. We appreciate all of the screened openings available. It actually does set up instantly when you toss it to the gound. When taking it down, it collapese easily back into the compact circle shape.... it just takes a little practice. Giving it only four stars for we ordered the tent color scheme w the dark green n light green combo but we received the black n green color scheme. The color scheme we ordered cost $129.00 while the black n green color scheme is $89.00, a forty dollar difference.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Smith

customer_reviews.title: Use in fair weather only or a big tarp! LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. 2 doors. 2 windows. Super quick setup. And that’s about it. CONS. Leaks like a sieve! Both door canopies do not cover the zippers at the bottom. 6” of zipper exposed at bottom. Not water tight! No seam seal tape used. Also leaks most of the way around floor. Fair weather tent only! Must use a tarp if rain expected! I used a hydrophobic spray seal on all seams, might have missed a spot or two. After it dries out, will use more water proofing spray.
customer_reviews.author: Obi

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Easy up - takes about 5 seconds. We watched a couple instructional videos on how to fold it up. Easy. Got it folded up and back in the bag on the first attempt. Only about 30 seconds. Can't wait to use this on our trip. More than enough space for two. Fine for two and a child. Not sure how you would squeeze four adults in it but might work for three or four children. May fit a full-size air mattress. Not sure of how it will perform in the rain. We will be positioning it under our camper awning and sitting on our outdoor carpet.
customer_reviews.author: TonnieC

customer_reviews.title: however on first inspection it seems fine. It pops up in seconds and is pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Not tried this tent in the wet yet, however on first inspection it seems fine. It pops up in seconds and is pretty easy to re pack if you follow the video. Construction looks good, the only strange thing is teh internal mosquito curtain which is open at the sides. I guess Fivejoy do not know that Mossies can get through gaps! Will sleep 2 adults and a couple of kids, 4 adults not going to happen unless you like close company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tent So Much!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my tent and Love it!!! I put it up in the front room. My Grandkids Love it!!! My Grandkids, Daughter and I are so Very Happy with this Tent!!!! The look on my Grandkid’s faces were Priceless. They immediately pulled in their two grey bean bag chairs and put in a sleeping bag, pillows, blankets, hanging light....etc. They were in Heaven!!!! Words cannot express how much we all Love it!!!! Thanks so much, Viv
customer_reviews.author: Vivagypsy

customer_reviews.title: They lied (just a little bit)
customer_reviews.text: In their product introduction video here, they boast this can be closed in 5 seconds. They lied. Using the way in their (shortened) video, it can not be closed in 5 seconds. It would take maybe half minute to one minute. Still very impressive for sure. On the other hand, this thing can potentially be setup within 5 seconds. You just pull it out of the bag and toss it up, boom, it is ready to use!
customer_reviews.author: RAY

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Is as easy as it says to setup and fold down, however a twin blow up bed barely fits in it. ( Have to squish the ends of the bed to zip the door.)Also i don't like that the window flaps don't zip all the way closed, so they flap in the night. No canopy for the top is an issue. I am keeping it as those issues are not a total deal breakers. I would say maybe two adults in sleeping bags, but no way if you have a blow up matress.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Holes and irregular
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a great tent. Pops up in seconds and is large. Definitely room for 4 adults with some equipment. The two stars are because it came with a ripped hole, and improperly sewed seams. I can't return it now, since I didn't notice them until I started sealing the seams. Which if you do buy, I would definitely do that. Not all seams are sealed. Hopefully I get reimbursed for the patches I have to buy that weren't included.
customer_reviews.author: Malwina

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. Got to our campsite in Moab late ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Got to our campsite in Moab late & I would have rathered sleep in the car than piece together a tent. Worth every penny! but.... zippers for the windows are on the outside of the tent .......odd. Watch folding instructions on YouTube, it’s impossible trying to follow the instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F.

customer_reviews.title: This tent is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We love the way you can just pull it out of its carrying case, just toss it in the air and your tent is up! Plenty of room for 2 adults and a large dog. We cut out the additional zippered areas on both ends and created additional space. Also nice that you can enter/exit the tent from both ends. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: G. Combs

customer_reviews.title: which are useful for holding phones and small items
customer_reviews.text: Tent setup and take down is the quickest, easiest I have ever had. Tent is slightly bulky when in it's bag to be carried, it's a large circle, but the setup and takedown makes the tent beyond worth it. There's so much space inside the tent, and the windows on the sides allow a lot of airflow. There are pockets on the inside of the tent as well, which are useful for holding phones and small items. It's also really great to be able to enter the tent on both sides! I can't rave enough about this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option for people like me who want a tent to go up fast and with little or no effort.  Nice! I like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! I'm the worst at putting up tents, so the Pop-Up idea is ideal for me. You may want to know that this particular tent stores flat against a wall, not in a little umbrella-like storage bag. I didn't realize that and had to change from the way I planned to store it, but it's working great stored with several other outdoor items that are also stored flat up against the wall. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is so easy to put up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m always tired when I get to a location and this this tent makes setting up camp so easy. I be used it the mountains, desert and though a rainstorm with no problems. Packing it back up takes a bit of practice, but isn’t too hard once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: fuzcat

customer_reviews.title: But after packing it up 2 times now successfully (figured it out on the 3rd try) this is going to be a great tent for family out
customer_reviews.text: Easiest set up ever! After reading reviews & watching vids of how to pack up, I have to admit I was a little scared... But after packing it up 2 times now successfully (figured it out on the 3rd try) this is going to be a great tent for family outings. The true test will come this weekend out on the Playa @ Burning Man! )'(
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Don't for the doors!
customer_reviews.text: The tent material it's self could be tougher. There was some ware on the tent probably from rubbing against the zipper of the carry bag during transit. Besides that it's pretty great, it would be nice to open and close the side windows from the inside but it makes sense when letting the air in or out (when you fold or open the tent). Dig the color and it does turn heads, especially when setting up. You shouldn't have to but just pay attention to instructional vids and you won't break the poles.
customer_reviews.author: David lopez

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent. It's super easy to use obviously. Even when you figure out how to pack it up I had to youtube it. Used it all summer and had one hoop already ripped off where a rope tie down attached. Plus the floor is just like the rest of the material so you will have to put a liner down on the ground. Its a nice tent. I fear normal wear and tear will be a little more harsh on this tent. But still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and put away. Enough space for a full size air mattress and still had space to store my bags. The material is sturdy but probably not suited for rough terrain or harsh weather conditions. Overall a great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tent Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tent! Super easy set up, take down and put away!! Used it on our recent Big Bend National Park trip. First night in Terlingua we were on a hilltop and the wind was relentless. We couldn’t get our stakes in the ground so we put a loaded cooler at each end and went to bed. Absolutely no problem with the tent. Second night was a lot better stay in the park(remote camping) Had we not had the super ease of set up and take down we would have not moved nor would we have stayed our second night elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Renessa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent
customer_reviews.text: I got the greatest looks when I tossed my tent out and it popped up on its own. People were truly amazed. So was I, tbh. It's not very good in the rain, but works great as long as its dry. Recommend some sort of tarp under it and another to cover it, it will collect rain and pool it inside. Not recommended for rain forests, Highly recommended for dry weather.
customer_reviews.author: ZiRiS

customer_reviews.title: Check weather report before taking this tent camping
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for an easier tent to set up! I was hoping it would be waterproof but it's not. However, it is a decent tent for the money. Fairly spacious inside with lots of nice ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a potato bug
customer_reviews.text: The tent was awesome nice for a little weekend camping trip, nothing too "in-tents" :) but....HOLY CANNOLI THE COMPANY WON'T STOP CALLING ME ASKING FOR A REVIEW...LEAVE ME ALONE
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Window covers on the outside
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of a hassle to have the rolling window covers on the outside. Also, some ants did get in the tent. Super fast set up, pops up as advertised. Folding it takes a bit of practice, but very fast once you get it.
customer_reviews.author: JokerBawlz

customer_reviews.title: Review after several years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof! No rain fly available for it! Annoying windows that can’t be adjusted except by getting out of the tent. Very easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: dan hauser

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Setup.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent for quick overnight camping trips with ths family, set up was fast and extremely simple. While others fumbled around setting up their tents I simply unpacked the tent and it popped open, ready to go. Slept two adults and one child comfortably. We used a inflatable fullsize bed and a sleeping bag, plenty of room. Tent remained bug and water free the entirety of the trip, just as long as were conscious of quickly closing all windows and doors when opened. With windows open tent provides plenty of ventilation and good airflow. Others from our trip have decided they were going to purchase this tent for the next excursion.
customer_reviews.author: Violent Diarea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Family
customer_reviews.text: We used this for 4th of July weekend to camp with 2 adults and a baby. This tent was perfect for us. The wind howled but the tent stayed secure and we were warm and toasty all night. As far as the set up? So easy and simple! It took us less time to set up camp and more time to enjoy with the family! It fit comfortably a Full size air mattress and a small area for the baby to sleep next to us. It really is a great item and we are so happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa and Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sweet , light tent!
customer_reviews.text: Have some health problems, my son was always having to set up my tent, so to pay him back I bought him one too! Easiest light tent I’ve ever known!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Material
customer_reviews.text: Really love the size and convenience of this tent, however, the material feels cheap and feels like it’ll rip easily. For now, it does it’s job but don’t plan on using this when it rains. Water seeped through making everything in the tent damp.
customer_reviews.author: Dez_B

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for two
customer_reviews.text: By far the most easily set up tent I have every owned, but when putting the tent back up is a little challenging takes a few practices
customer_reviews.author: Zon

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but putting it on your pack makes you look like a Ninja turtle and you become Ostracized by all relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Brink

customer_reviews.title: Great but really annoying flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Neat tent and easy to put up and down. But why on earth aren't can't you open the windows from the inside too and not just the outside? So lame.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing, fits the whole family with ease. Setup is super fast, just pops right up.
customer_reviews.author: David Buskirk

customer_reviews.title: Great size tent
customer_reviews.text: Great size tent. Fits a queen flat air mattress perfectly. But no room left over. Goes up extremely well easy... putting away takes practice :)
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Jesme

customer_reviews.title: Held out great but very cramped in there for 2 adults
customer_reviews.text: Camped in this tent for over a week in Moab. Held out great but very cramped in there for 2 adults. Maybe if it was a night than that's fine but anymore than that is bothersome. The wind has started ripping the bag for it since we had put away on our roof rack. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Nate W.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Took this tent with me to Burning Man. SUPER easy setup, as well as take-down. Almost no dust got into the tent thanks to the zippers to cover the openings. The tent was big enough to fit my queen air mattress. There are tons of zippers that attach netting on both entrances, which got a little confusing at times, but that didn't bother me much. Overall great product; recommending it to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the size
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the tent seems to be of great quality. I have yet to take it camping, but I set it up in my backyard to find that the tent is much smaller than expected. Not even large enough to fit two twin size air mattresses. Three people might be able to fit if they squeeze together on just mats, but don't expect to ever be able to fit 4 people in this tent. I may be exchanging this tent for a larger one. I was very disappointed with the size, but other than that it was a very easy set-up, although I have yet to figure out how to get the tent back into its carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Molly E.

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly easy to setup and take down. Perfect for warm weather camping. Our only issue was with the cheap zippers/stitching. The main door zippers kept snagging and splitting. I still love it though!
customer_reviews.author: heather m

customer_reviews.title: Crushed camping dreams
customer_reviews.text: LITERAL TRASH. Just got it an hour ago and straight out of the package it was broken. The rod was literally snapped and poking through. This made it literally impossible to fold back into the packaging or put into a box. Can't even send it back for a refund because of this. It's sitting in a dumpster. When trying to fold it back up the snapped rod twisted the opposite way of where it should have and popped my kid in the face. That could have been really dangerous. Worst, most disappointing purchase I've ever made. Total waste of my very limited money.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna O.

customer_reviews.title: light, fast, easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. tried it out in the front yard to get the hang of folding it. here's a hint with folding it: once you make your taco, make sure you're grabbing the taco in the center and both sides are relatively even. now bend one open end of the taco BACKWARDS (away from the hand holding the taco together. roughly fold a third of it back. you'll see two rings form that meet in the center. you basically overlap those, as in, sliding one behind the other. once i got the hang of it i can fold it in about 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Broseph

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I returned it immediately because I opened it in my backyard and it felt like poor quality material
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gomez

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love it, super easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: rob hanson

customer_reviews.title: This tent is wonderful! It pops up on an instant and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is wonderful! It pops up on an instant and it is incredibly roomy on the inside! Highly recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Opens and closed up super easily, earning the 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Opens and closed up super easily, earning the 4 stars. Why do the windows open from the outside? Kind of awkward in that design.
customer_reviews.author: W. Franck

customer_reviews.title: Folding
customer_reviews.text: To hard to fold back to small size instructions dint make since tried every way we could never could get it back to it regular size set up is great getting in back back down is the problem .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but thin.
customer_reviews.text: It's roomy. But the material is thinner than other pop up tents. It leaked the first time I used it. The rains were heavier than usual, still I didn't expect the rain to leak through the seams that quickly. It doesn't seem to be the handiest tent for varied weather camping.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent. Easy set up/takedown
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent. Easy set up/takedown. Well ventilated and cool w 2 entrances an 2 windows. Leaked a bit in hard rain, but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani Motta

customer_reviews.title: The tent is great if you're looking for an easy small tent for ...
customer_reviews.text: The tent is great if you're looking for an easy small tent for low maintenance trips. It will leak with even the smallest about of condensation though so you do need a rain cover.
customer_reviews.author: CMW17

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was recieve the damage tent and then I return it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tent for my son and he loves it. It's so easy to setup, pull it out of its carry case and shake it and like magic it's ready to go. He can't wait to use it...
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Overall, satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously easy to set up. Challenge to fold up. Had to watch the video many times, and make multiple attempts in order to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Lit Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking and easy but have not actually been used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A .Antonoff

customer_reviews.title: Fastest tent setup
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. Putting it back is a bit of a pain till you get the hang of it but 2 people are almost necessary to fold it. Would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Bhupinder virk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and plenty of room. Piece of cake to collapse once you practice a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I spent 5 minutes learning to putting up and taking down the tent. Now I can do it all in less than a minute. Easy! Fast! I have not slept in it, but there is plenty of room. I don't plan on having more than 2-3 people in it. 3 would be tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent - So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent - So easy to use! I learned that its more important to have a tarp cover the top during rain versus the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... made and the kids are having a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Well made and the kids are having a lot of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent easy to open and fold back up. It's a little expensive but I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up! And really not too difficult to fold back down. Still have to try it out camping in the Dry Tortuga's! Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: J L N

customer_reviews.title: Leaking seams
customer_reviews.text: First time use of the tent. There was rain. It leaked like a broken water pipe where the floor and wall met. I moved to my vehicle to sleep. Due to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very very nice! difficult to put it back again but not impossible
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: ... fold it up its going to work out just great for what i want
customer_reviews.text: once i watched to you tube video on how to fold it up its going to work out just great for what i want. it is not rain proof so its n ot for serious camping but will work for the summer fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but...
customer_reviews.text: Roomie on the inside. Fit me, my 10 year old daughter and my 5 year old son. Two small air mattresses. And I was even able to store some gear. The problems though are you have to crawl on the ground to get in the thing. With other people in the tent you can't really move around freely. You can sit up in it depending on how tall you sit. And after 6 tries I still have not been able to close it properly to store it in the bag provided. Still not a horrible experience if you want something you open up, throw in the air and it opens up and is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: DSMoove

customer_reviews.title: This tent performed as advertised. As soon as it ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent performed as advertised. As soon as it came out of the bag, it immediately popped up! The tent takes a little bit of rain without leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis C. Nojima

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Has held up for the 3 months we have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, sturdy, high quality tent. We were delighted at how easy it is to pop up! This easily accommodates 4 people, and their gear. You've made one little boy scout very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for one guy and his gear great tent.
customer_reviews.text: Took Three goes to put back in bag , for one guy and his gear great tent .,useing at Axialfest in July
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Second time my girlfriend and I have used the tent and it already has broken/ bent tube (making impossible to repackage) not to mention already notice tears in the mesh windows and all the zippers are cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kane Butler

customer_reviews.title: Up in seconds...
customer_reviews.text: Pops up just as advertised. A little trickier to fold it back up, but once you get the first time it is a breeze. Plenty of room for three and will fit four. Very warm with the doors and windows zipped and breezy when all open. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and the easiest setup ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent!! It pops up quick and the windows and doors get a nice crossdraft for camping in hot weather. Stand clear when you open it though....
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: This. Thing. Rocks.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome! My kids loved it! I've been weary of getting another tent because I have no patience for set up-so this was perfect. I literally grabbed one side and it popped open and voila! The look on my daughter's face was hilarious too. Set up was truly a breeze and So was getting it closed up once they were finished. The only thing is that I wasn't quite able to get it back into the bag it came in. But that was only a minor hiccup. I don't think you'll be disappointed in this one! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joolz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I had with this is it will not refill to fit back into carry case
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent. Easy to setup. watch you tube - how to fold it back (easy too). Thank you for nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: Good tent but hard to fold up, and instructions not real clear on how to fold it Kind of bulky when folded
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tent!!! Easily fit my husband, me, two sons, and boxer. So easy to put up !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super quick to set up, big enough to sleep comfortably. Too bad windows open from the outside
customer_reviews.author: MARTA KUSEK

customer_reviews.title: So awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing. I am not much of a camper, but my husband and I decided to get off of the grid for a couple days. I was not thrilled at the thought of having to set up a tent after a long day of driving. This tent set up perfectly and was very simple. Putting it away took a couple of tries, but even that was simple too. I am very happy that we decided to buy this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not figure how to get it back in storage container other than that great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tent
customer_reviews.text: No more dreading of set upping of a tent. It's like a miracle happens before your eyes. Easy to fold too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the concept of folding back the tent was a little less easy, but easy none-the-less
customer_reviews.text: The pop up was instantaneous. Having use one of the fold up shades for car windows, the concept of folding back the tent was a little less easy, but easy none-the-less. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Legaspi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and roomier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and roomier than I expected. I would definately recommend this for camping, or sleepovers in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how easily it opens - still practicing at getting it back in the bag by myself
customer_reviews.author: C M B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Popup Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy pop up.. a little difficult to take down but very durable
customer_reviews.author: Daphann5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent tent in all respects, and we're very happy with it. Easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the way it was INSTANT
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it was INSTANT. But the company should provide a video as it was already mentioned in other review to make it clear how to assemble it back in less than an hour and not almost breaking up with the person you gave it to.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tent
customer_reviews.text: The set up is super easy. But the material quality is cheap. It does not stand up to wetness and the first time I opened it the fabric tore around the supports rendering the tent useless.
customer_reviews.author: LMTgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent but NOT user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tent.....however.....we've watched the YouTube videos, we've read the instructions again and again and we cannot fold this sucker back up and put it in the bag.We camp a lot and we aren't stupid but it is incredibly hard to do. Just be forewarned. Edited to add: The tent itself is wonderful and does pop right up. All the videos show folding back up a smaller tent. One of the other reviewers, Meryl posted the best video and it allowed us to fold ours back up and put it in the bag. It is still difficult to do however.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: it was great. Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Once I mastered folding it up from a Utube video, it was great. Instructions, while correct did not quite convey the "technique". Once shown how to do it, very quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is AWESOME!!! I love it. I did some research and comparison and bought this one due to ease of set up and tear down. I bought this for summer use and it is going to get used a lot this year.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your a car camper this is a super simple tent to set up and take down fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tippi Etzel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, friendly, efficient. Great product. Easy to set up and put away. FiveJoy has made a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Erock

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and to fold up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and to fold up. I used this tent in steady 20mph winds with no problems. The windows and entry doors are large and when open allow very nice ventilation. I am very happy with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ciuzak

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept but this thing leaked on me during a light rain while camping?? I woke up in a puddle of water? I was however the first one to have my camp area set-up.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorExplorer

product_meta.title: FiveJoy Instant Popup Camping Tent (1-3 Person) - NO Assembly Required - Easy Setup in Seconds - Great for Fair Weather Camping, Families, Festivals
feature_bullets: ⛺ EASY and STRESS FREE SET UP - Remove your instant, free-standing tent from the packaging and watch it pop up automatically (you can literally count the seconds this takes!). No need to fumble with tent poles, or bother with complicated instructions. The tent comes in a portable carrying bag so you can easily fold up, pack in, and head off on a new adventure!

👼 LET YOUR KIDS BE KIDS AGAIN - Set up camp in your backyard and have your kids leave their phones in the house. Enjoy a breath of healthy fresh air, and warm sunlight in this cozy outdoor fort. Expand their imagination by playing outside like we did (we won't ask you how long ago that was if you don't).

🍃 THOUGHTFUL DESIGN - Openings on both the left and right sides are covered by a solid nylon flap provides cross ventilation and privacy. Let air in, while keeping the bugs out! DOUBLE DOORS allow total privacy. Keep the area inside the tent clean and organized. Conveniently hang your battery or electric powered lantern from the hang loop and store your car keys or phone in the storage pockets.

🏖️ MULTI PURPOSE- Turn your windows into a rain fly by attaching guy lines to the loops below the window flap and secure them to stakes a short distance from the tent. Guy lines and stakes/ pegs are included. Enjoy protection from the sun on the beach or park. We recommend using a tent tarp beneath the tent, and rainfly overhead.

💯 QUALITY YOU CAN COUNT ON- Durable seams, sturdy zippers, and water resistant PU coated polyester...this tent was designed for optimal comfort, lasting quality, and ease of use. Enjoy casual camping, outdoor recreational activities, boy/ girl scout, and family gatherings. NOT FOR EXTREME BACKPACKING OR USE IN HEAVY RAIN.
